r.d: Provides a set of classes and functions for grabbing video frames from video capture devices.
r.n: - Changed the --enable-framegrab option to --with-framegrab since you specify the PNG library path on the configure line. - Changed FrameGrabImage::writePNG() to FrameGrabImage::writeAsPNG(). - Added FrameGrabImage::toStringAsPNG() which returns the image as PNG data as a string. This allows the output to be fed straight in to GD without requiring an intermediate file.
